price: На Дан када богобојазне, као делегацију, пред Свемилосним сакупимо,
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
